item.description:
Hello, because this is the 1st meeting some might think it would be weird to show up at some strangers home (mine) and just play...so anyone else know of a great place we could rent out in Woburn/near there I'd be willing to listen and then arrange that; otherwise we have space in our home, we have room in the frig for your beverage of choice, we have the social and "unshy" ability to let very like minded folks in and make them feel welcome while we begin what could become long lasting friendships and partnerships in the game of Euchre...
so let's get together and shuffle!
item.why: this is a great way to brush up your skills whilst socializing with new like minded folks, with an easy-going atmosphere, but have fun while competing in just about the most awesome, addictive card game.

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: Your first and fabulous Euchre meet-up!
